titleStmt.title: Die Jovis 23. Decemb. 1641. Commons House. Whereas his most excellent Majestie was graciously pleased, by the advice, and with the assent of his Parliament to command a publike fast to be kept and observed by both Houses of Parliament and the City of London,...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: And by the Assignes of John Bill.,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
